content.question: <math alttext="The limit as n approaches infinity, of, the sum from k equals 1 to n, of, open parenthesis, the fourth root of 2, plus, the fraction with numerator 3 k, and denominator n, end fraction, end root, times, the fraction with numerator 3, and denominator n, close parenthesis, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munder><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mroot><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mroot><mo>⋅</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="The integral from, 0 to 3, of, the fourth root of x, end root, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mroot><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mroot></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="3 times, the integral from, 0 to 1, of, the fourth root of 2, plus, x, end root, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mroot><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mroot></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
